dt-example.title: PreDefined Search
dt-example.info:
This example shows how to create a pre-defined filter using `-init searchBuilder.preDefined`. More details on the structure and properties can be found at
* `-init searchBuilder.preDefined` * `-init searchBuilder.preDefined.logic` * `-init searchBuilder.preDefined.criteria` * `-init searchBuilder.preDefined.criteria.condition` * `-init searchBuilder.preDefined.criteria.dataTitle` * `-init searchBuilder.preDefined.criteria.value`
